Elegant Embroidery: The detailed embroidery enhances the kurta's aesthetic, making it suitable for both casual and formal settings. Versatile Design: With its below knee length and boat neck, this kurta is perfect for a variety of occasions, from work to weekend gatherings. Practical Pockets: Includes a pocket for added convenience, allowing you to carry essentials with ease. Whether you're heading to a brunch or an evening event, this kurta adapts effortlessly to any setting, ensuring you look and feel your best. Wash and Care Hand Wash 30°C. Wash Dark Colours Separately. Do Not Bleach. Line Dry. Do Not Iron On Embellishment. Cool Iron. Do Not Dry Clean.
